00014 curlyqueue_node_t* curly_create_node( void* value, curlyqueue_node_t* prev, curlyqueue_node_t* next ){
00015         
00016         curlyqueue_node_t* node = ( curlyqueue_node_t* )malloc( sizeof( curlyqueue_node_t ) );
00017         
00018         node->value     = value;
00019         node->prev      = prev;

00032 curlyqueue_t* curly_create_queue(){
00033         
00034         curlyqueue_t* queue = malloc( sizeof( curlyqueue_t ) );
00035         
00036         queue->back             = NULL;
00037         queue->front    = NULL;
00038         queue->count    = 0;
00039         
00040         return queue;
00041 }

00051 void curly_destroy_queue( curlyqueue_t* queue ){
00052         
00056         curlyqueue_node_t* curr = queue->back;
00057                 
00061         curlyqueue_node_t* next;
00062         
00063         /* while the current node isn't the end of the list*/
00064         while( curr != NULL ){
00065                 
00066                 next = curr->next;
00067                 
00068                 if( NULL != curr->value ){
00069                         //TODO: do we need to free the node value?
00070                         //free( curr->value );
00071                 }
00072                 
00073                 free( curr );
00074                 
00075                 curr = next;
00076                 
00077                 queue->count--;
00078         }
00079         
00080         
00081         free( queue );
00082         
00083         /* dedangle pointer */
00084         queue = NULL;
00085 }

00094 void curly_enqueue( curlyqueue_t* queue, void* value ){
00095         
00096         curlyqueue_node_t* prev = NULL;
00097         curlyqueue_node_t* next = queue->back;
00098         
00099         curlyqueue_node_t* node = curly_create_node( value, prev, next );
00100         
00101         /* if this is the first node, the tail = the head*/
00102         if( curly_queue_is_empty( queue ) ){
00103                 
00104                 queue->front = node;
00105                 
00106         }else{
00107                 
00108                 queue->back->prev = node;
00109                 
00110         }
00111         
00112         queue->back = node;
00113         
00114         /* increment the list's internal count of nodes */
00115         queue->count++; 
00116 }

00121 void* curly_dequeue( curlyqueue_t* queue, except_t* e ){
00122         
00123         if( curly_queue_is_empty( queue ) ){
00124                 /* throw exception */
00125                 e->thrown = 1;
00126                 memcpy( e->type, "empty_q", 8 );
00127                 return NULL;
00128         }
00129 
00130         /* store the value of the node currently at the front of the q */
00131         void* value = queue->front->value;
00132 
00133         if( 1 == queue->count ){
00134 
00135                 free( queue->front );
00136 
00137                 /* dedangle pointers */
00138                 queue->front    = NULL;
00139                 queue->back     = NULL;
00140 
00141         }else{
00142                 curlyqueue_node_t* old_front    = queue->front;
00143                 curlyqueue_node_t* new_front    = queue->front->prev;
00144 
00145                 queue->front = new_front;
00146                 new_front->next = NULL;
00147 
00148                 free( old_front );              
00149         }
00150 
00151         queue->count--;
00152 
00153         return value;
00154 }

00165 int curly_queue_is_empty( curlyqueue_t* queue ){
00166         if( 0 == queue->count ){
00167                 return 1;
00168         }else{
00169                 return 0;
00170         }
00171 }
